slides.title: Watch expressions
slides.description: Quick tour to watch expressions from Espruino in popup

slides.title: Condition
slides.description:
this tour will run perfect, if
  • watch is diabled in options
  • IDE is connected to a board

slides.title: Set timing
slides.description:
First select how long you want to watch expressions



Next select how often you want data to be updated

slides.title: Set expressions
slides.description: In this formular you define expressions, you would like to observe

slides.title: Run watch
slides.description:
Starts watching the expressions,
you will see last value and small sparkline.

slides.title: Stop watching
slides.description: If you want to stop this immediately, wiithout waiting click this button

slides.title: Watch done
slides.description: ...Now that you got a first overview, check the functions by yourself and enjoy.
